On the start menu click on start quiz button. 
Choose the level you wish to play.
For each levels, questions will be provided on the screen along with four button.

Each button contain one correct answer and three remaining wrong answer.
Click on the button that you think has the correct answer to the question, and the computer will tell you if it's true or false. 

You need to get at least 10 correct answers, to unlock the next level. 
And don't forget to rate the app :)
